div.div:
Entry 1
key=ThreadLocal_A (弱引用)
value=数据1 (强引用)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 490px; margin-left: 111px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Entry 3
key=ThreadLocal_C (弱引用)
value=数据3 (强引用)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 420px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Entry 2 (已泄漏)
key=null (ThreadLocal已被GC)
value=数据2 (强引用仍存在)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 128px; height: 1px; padding-top: 490px; margin-left: 251px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
Entry 4 (已泄漏)
key=null (ThreadLocal已被GC)
value=数据4 (强引用仍存在)

div.div: 长期存活的线程（如线程池中的线程）

switch.text: 长期存活的线程（如线程池中的线程）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 458px; height: 1px; padding-top: 605px; margin-left: 71px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 内存泄漏原因：ThreadLocal 被 GC 回收后，ThreadLocalMap 中对应 Entry 的 key 变为 null，但 value 仍然被强引用，无法被 GC 回收

switch.text: 内存泄漏原因：ThreadLocal 被 GC 回收后，ThreadLocalMap 中对应 Entry 的 key 变为 null，但 value 仍然被强引用，无法被 GC 回收

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 605px; margin-left: 551px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: 解决方案: 使用完 ThreadLocal 后必须调用remove() 方法

switch.text: 解决方案: 使用完 ThreadLocal 后必须调用remove() 方法

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
